title: 1976–77 Kentucky Wildcats men's basketball team
text: The 1976–77 Kentucky Wildcats men's basketball team represented <a href="University%20of%20Kentucky">University of Kentucky</a> in the <a href="1976-77%20NCAA%20Division%20I%20men%27s%20basketball%20season">1976-77 NCAA Division I men's basketball season</a>. This was the first season Kentucky played in <a href="Rupp%20Arena">Rupp Arena</a>.
